GenerateAssemblyInfo.description: Controls whether `AssemblyInfo` attributes are generated for the project.

GeneratedAssemblyInfoFile.description: The path to the generated file that contains all generated assembly attributes.

GenerateAssemblyCompanyAttribute.description: Controls whether the `AssemblyCompanyAttribute` assembly attribute is generated using the `Company` property.

GenerateAssemblyConfigurationAttribute.description: Controls whether the `AssemblyConfigurationAttribute` assembly attribute is generated using the `Configuration` property.

GenerateAssemblyCopyrightAttribute.description: Controls whether the `AssemblyCopyrightAttribute` assembly attribute is generated using the `Copyright` property.

GenerateAssemblyDescriptionAttribute.description: Controls whether the `AssemblyDescriptionAttribute` assembly attribute is generated using the `Description` property.

GenerateAssemblyFileVersionAttribute.description: Controls whether the `AssemblyFileVersionAttribute` assembly attribute is generated using the `FileVersion` property.

GenerateAssemblyInformationalVersionAttr.description: Controls whether the `AssemblyInformationalVersionAttribute` assembly attribute is generated using the `InformationalVersion` property.

GenerateAssemblyTrademarkAttribute.description: Controls whether the `AssemblyTrademarkAttribute` assembly attribute is generated using the `Trademark` property.

GenerateAssemblyProductAttribute.description: Controls whether the `AssemblyProductAttribute` assembly attribute is generated using the `Product` property.

GenerateAssemblyTitleAttribute.description: Controls whether the `AssemblyTitleAttribute` assembly attribute is generated using the `AssemblyTitle` property.

GenerateAssemblyVersionAttribute.description: Controls whether the `AssemblyVersionAttribute` assembly attribute is generated using the `AssemblyVersion` property.

GenerateRepositoryUrlAttribute.description: Controls whether the `RepositoryUrlAttribute` assembly attribute is generated using the `RepositoryUrl` or `PrivateRepositoryUrl` property. This attribute is only generated when targeting .NET 4.5 or higher.

GenerateNeutralResourcesLanguageAttribut.description: Controls whether the `NeutralResourcesLanguageAttribute` assembly attribute is generated using the `NeutralLanguage` property.

GenerateAssemblyMetadataAttributes.description: Controls whether `AssemblyMetadataAttribute` assembly attributes are generated for the project from `AssemblyMetadata` items.

IncludeSourceRevisionInInformationalVers.description: Controls whether the `SourceRevisionId` property is included in the generated `AssemblyInformationalVersionAttribute` assembly attribute.

GenerateInternalsVisibleToAttributes.description: Controls whether `InternalsVisibleToAttribute` attributes are generated for the project from `InternalsVisibleTo` items.

GenerateRequiresPreviewFeaturesAttribute.description: Controls whether the `RequiresPreviewFeaturesAttribute` assembly attribute is generated when the project is targeting the latest `TargetFramework` and the `EnablePreviewFeatures` property is `true`.

GenerateTargetPlatformAttribute.description: Controls whether the `TargetPlatformAttribute` assembly attribute is generated using the `TargetPlatformIdentifier` and `TargetPlatformVersion` properties, which are derived from the platform component of the `TargetFramework`. This attribute is only generated when targeting .NET 5.0 or higher.

GenerateSupportedOSPlatformAttribute.description: Controls whether the `SupportedOSPlatformAttribute` assembly attribute is generated using the `SupportOSPlatform` property. This attribute is only generated for projects targeting .NET 5.0 or higher. This attribute is only generated when targeting .NET 5.0 or higher.

GenerateDisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribu.description: Controls whether the `DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute` assembly attribute is generated when the `DisableRuntimeMarshalling` property is set to `true`. This attribute is only generated when targeting .NET 7.0 or higher
